Package in.co.rays.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataUtility
    DataUtility class provides various utility methods for data conversion and formatting including String, int, long, Date, and Timestamp.
    DataValidator
    DataValidator class provides static utility methods to validate various types of data such as strings, integers, long values, emails, names, roll numbers, passwords, phone numbers, dates, and day of the week.
    EmailBuilder
    EmailBuilder class provides static utility methods to generate HTML email messages for various user account actions such as registration, password recovery, and password change.
    EmailMessage
    EmailMessage class represents an email with its basic attributes such as recipient, subject, message content, and message type.
    EmailUtility
    EmailUtility is a helper class for sending emails using SMTP.
    HTMLUtility
    HTMLUtility is a helper class for generating HTML form elements dynamically.
    JDBCDataSource
    JDBCDataSource is a singleton class that provides database connection pooling using C3P0.
    PropertyReader
    PropertyReader is a utility class that reads values from a resource bundle.
    ServletUtility
    ServletUtility is a utility class that provides helper methods for servlet operations such as forwarding, redirecting, setting/getting request attributes, and handling exceptions.
